content:
I have prepared the SMART Web Messaging IG, taking it through the CI / auto-build process.

The latest draft is here: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/smart-web-messaging/

The QA output is here (and clean): https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/smart-web-messaging/qa.html

I would request that FHIR-I include this topic for discussion in next Monday's agenda. Also, if you have any feedback for the spec prior to ballot, I would like to initiate the process to collect it from the sponsoring group. I'll also be requesting the same from the co-sponsors shortly.

You can email me directly with feedback, and you can also post feedback on the GitHub source here: https://github.com/HL7/smart-web-messaging/issues
@Bas van den Heuvel - thanks for suggesting that I post this here.
